item.title: The little larder do not dispose of rubbish correctly, 16th October
item.description:
The little larder just throw food and food wrappings into bins with no lid encouraging foxes and rats to rip bags open. Also they leave the rubbish from commercial re building works in alleyway. Lots was removed from council yesterday and today there is more back

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plaistow Grove, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet
